name: Mr. Triangle
description:
Mr. Triangle is a simple & very challenging and addictive game!!

Dots fall from top, rotate the triangle to divert the ball to match the color.

The longer you survive, the more you score. So, get ready for most addictive game ever.

Features
~~~~~~~~~~~~
- iOS 10 support
- Awesome Gameplay music
- Cute Characters
- Better sound effects
- Enjoy beautiful minimalistic design and relaxing game music
- Adorable , fun, and thoughtful design

Having any problems? Any suggestions? We would love to hear from you! You can reach us at support at - contact@digitalhole.co
